Use a screen capture tool to take a capture of you R session showing version 4.1.2

Homework 0.1
1) Make sure Rstudio is version 2021.09.2-382.exe, if not, update it
2) Make sure R is version 4.1.2, if not, update it
3) Run the start up script here:
https://github.com/coreysparks/Rcode/blob/master/install_first_7283.R

In Rstudio type:

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/coreysparks/Rcode/master/install_first_7283.R")

4) run update.packages(ask=F) in Rstudio to make sure everything is up to date

5) Take a screen shot of your Rstudio window, showing the version of R at 4.1.2, here is mine:
